titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Class of 1915, Yale College, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:46

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, clippings, printed materials, and memorabilia documenting the members of the Yale College Class of 1915.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 10-A (YRG 10-A), Records of Yale College classes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Class of 1915, Yale College, Records (RU 493). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, clippings, printed materials, and memorabilia documenting the members of the Yale College Class of 1915.

did.unittitle: Correspondence of Class of 1915 secretary William A. Jordan
